text: nam'muṭe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷ spaṣṭamāya nilayil avarkk vāyiccukēḷpikkappeṭṭāl avar (janaṅṅaḷēāṭ‌) paṟayuṁ: niṅṅaḷuṭe pitākkanmār ārādhicc vannirunnatil ninn niṅṅaḷe taṭayuvān āgrahikkunna orāḷ mātramāṇit‌. it keṭṭiccamaccuṇṭākkiya kaḷḷaṁ mātramāṇ ennuṁ avar paṟayuṁ. taṅṅaḷkk satyaṁ vannukiṭṭiyappēāḷ atine paṟṟi aviśvāsikaḷ paṟaññu: it spaṣṭamāya jālavidya mātramākunnu
